cards.title: üë§ Who I Am
content: I am a systems engineer fueled by a passion for technology and a dedication to helping individuals and small businesses thrive with minimal effort. My background as a certified IT security specialist and a versatile generalist enables me to create simple, effective, and accessible solutions for everyone, regardless of tech expertise.

I believe technology should be an enabler, not a barrier. I strive to build user-friendly websites that ensure easy navigation. Each project is driven by collaboration and open communication; I'm eager to help if you share this vision.

At my core, I am a problem-solver, leveraging my skills to identify opportunities for improvement and create innovative web tools for everyday challenges. My experiences working with hundreds of businesses ensure I meet both technical requirements and unique needs.
Ultimately, technology can connect us, and I'm committed to using my skills to foster relationships and build thriving communities in our digital world.

cards.title: üíº My Background and Experience
content: My tech journey began over a decade ago, driven by curiosity and problem-solving. As a systems engineer, I wear many hats, designing technology-based infrastructure that balances technical skills, strategic foresight, and teamwork.

I script packages for our internal AI chatbot, honing my coding skills and keeping up with the evolving landscape of AI. Writing PowerShell scripts has streamlined processes, enhancing efficiency for support teams.

My multidisciplinary background spans law firms, local governments, police departments, child protection services, manufacturing, and production. This experience fosters a growth mindset, helping me adapt to unique challenges from high-level infrastructures in AWS to localized technical issues.

My background extends beyond skills‚Äîit's about relationships with clients and colleagues and the stories they share. I pride myself on being a steadfast problem-solver, understanding technical requirements and the human element involved.

cards.title: üåê Why I Made This Page
content: This page is a cornerstone of my mission to democratize access to technology and empower individuals and small businesses through practical, innovative solutions. It's not just a showcase of my work; it‚Äôs a platform for creating connections, sharing knowledge, and driving meaningful change.

My vision is simple: technology should be a tool that uplifts people, not a barrier that limits them. By blending my technical expertise with a passion for fostering growth, I aim to bridge gaps and amplify voices‚Äîbe it through user-friendly websites, efficient automation, or community-driven projects.

Every project I take on reflects my core values of simplicity, accessibility, and collaboration. This page is a testament to my commitment to using technology as a means to create lasting impact and foster thriving, connected communities.
